company_details:
Website
TrueGether combines social, mobile, analytics, and AI to build human brain-like capabilities to buy and sell smarter. Since the internet can be so anonymous, our company is attempting to make an online marketplace that's not anonymous. TrueGether utilizes information from people's social media accounts such as LinkedIn and Facebook. Members have social profiles showing their social connections, recommendations, and feedback from others, so others get a true sense of who they are, where they're from, and what they're about.

In other words, they can see that the product being sold isn't by an anonymous seller but rather a real-life person who is not out to scam them. TrueGether has created a no-fee marketplace that provides a face-to-face aspect of online shopping. Our management team consists of people from top business schools, technical schools, and the e-commerce industry, we aim to give you a great buying and selling experience.

Here is what we have progressed so far as a biotech start-up:

1. Our molecules have been approved by the NIV selection committee for pre-clinical trials after the rigorous screening of its in-silico results. We have filed patents for these 3 molecules. company_details: Himalaya Labs is a London-based blockchain venture founded to bring the vision of HCX (Himalaya Capital Exchange) into reality. HCX is a blockchain and smart-contract driven platform where issuers (public and private firms, governments, non-profit foundations) can access a broad class of primary market investors (both institutional and retail), complete a variety of automated transactions and processes (such as book building, auctions, syndications, dividend distributions) and can issue a broad array of digital assets to investors. Investors of every type, jurisdiction, and financial status can use the platform to learn about investment opportunities across the globe, their regulatory aspects, risks, and expected returns, to access due-diligence reports, and to invest directly without having to go through intermediaries. The system can first be envisaged as a single-country system and then extended to a multi-country global marketplace.

Fin-tech is a combination of 'financial technology' and is used to describe new tech that seeks to improve & automate the delivery and use of financial services. At its core, fin-tech is utilized to help companies, business owners and consumers better manage their financial operations, processes, and lives by utilizing specialized software & algorithms that are used on computers and, increasingly, smartphones. Up until now, financial services institutions offered a variety of services under a single umbrella. In its most basic form, fin-tech unbundles these services into individual offerings. The combination of streamlined offerings with technology enables fin-tech companies to be more efficient and cut down on costs associated with each transaction. We make the complete loan disbursement process quick & easy. We are not only an enabler but also the driving engine for instant personal loans. We blend finance and technology, paving the way for the future of the finance sector in India.

company_details:
Listiee is a dynamic and agile startup of the 20th century that wants to solve the problem of the chaos of information on the internet. We are the first-ever generic listing platform on the internet that helps its users publish, ask, and discover a variety of lists. Our collaborative technology allows users on the platform with their friends and teams to build useful lists, list stacks, and boards. Realizing that the way to organize anything is to first build a list of it, what we have is the first step towards our big goal of solving the problem of the chaos of information.

Imagine a future where you are discovering data in the form of lists and each list item is linked with a variety of links related to it from the internet, contextually categorized, and suddenly you don't need to wander around to learn the jargon, know & play with the keywords on search engines, or visit other websites to get multiple sets of information. This is possible with us.

We are working towards making this world a much more efficient and economical place to live. Own less, live more! We operate across India, with our fulfillment centers in major cities. We have served more than 20,000 customers and helped them save a total of Rs 10 crores. Currently, we are a team of 12. Join our growing team and be part of the next big change!

company_details:
Food Vybe was conceptualized to purposefully attend to a very specific need that was not being addressed by any existing known restaurant directory/review portal. There was the need to know the 'vibe' of a place at any given point in time. We understand how important and valuable it is to know how crowded a place is. Even more so, during the time of a pandemic and after it passes as well. Through our 'vybe-o-meter', our users can get an estimated percentage of occupancy in real-time for any restaurant that we have listed with us.

The customers who choose to come to the restaurant would be well aware of the 'vybe' and can prepare accordingly. For example, they won't be surprised to have to wait for a table, or maybe someone would rather be happy to visit a less crowded restaurant for a corporate dinner meeting.

company_details:
Website
Fin-tech is a combination of 'financial technology' and is used to describe new tech that seeks to improve & automate the delivery and use of financial services. At its core, fin-tech is utilized to help companies, business owners and consumers better manage their financial operations, processes, and lives by utilizing specialized software & algorithms that are used on computers and, increasingly, smartphones. Up until now, financial services institutions offered a variety of services under a single umbrella. In its most basic form, fin-tech unbundles these services into individual offerings. The combination of streamlined offerings with technology enables fin-tech companies to be more efficient and cut down on costs associated with each transaction. We make the complete loan disbursement process quick & easy. We are not only an enabler but also the driving engine for instant personal loans. We blend finance and technology, paving the way for the future of the finance sector in India.

In India, the teacher-to-student ratio has always been enormously skewed. Students barely get individual attention and the opportunity to clarify doubts on a personal basis is very limited. Aside from the significant challenges that students face, urban working parents who hope for a better future for their children struggle to monitor and analyze their child's progress.

India has about 3500 listed startups in the domain of education and technology, still there exist many major problems which are yet to be addressed. We have recognized a key problem statement and are working to turn it into an opportunity by building an EdTech startup titled Almanac. Trainman is an online tool that gives information and intelligence pertaining to Indian Railways. Our product can be accessed via website and mobile app for Android, iPhone, and Windows platforms. It is a one-stop-shop for all information regarding Indian Railways. A user can check PNR status, seat availability, train schedule, etc. The USP of our product is confirmation chances of waiting list tickets. Trainman is the pioneer app in this segment and more than 90% of the predictions are correct. Trainman's Android app has more than 5 million downloads.

Any person who wants to travel by railways and has a device with internet-connectivity can use Trainman. It helps users in all the phases - trip planning, booking, and on-trip assistance. Nearly 2% of the Indian population is on trains on any given day! Owing to this enormous potential customer base, we have huge growth potential.

company_details: Himalaya Labs is a London-based blockchain venture founded to bring the vision of HCX (Himalaya Capital Exchange) into reality. company_details:
We are providing a first-of-its-kind home learning solution for preschoolers. Teaching preschool kids through online classes is not the best way to educate them because a child at that age gets easily bored by a teacher who the kid can only see on a screen and eventually the kid loses interest in studies. Moreover, continuously glaring a screen is very risky for a young one's eyes and can lead to wearing specs at this age.

So the question is, how is home-learning possible? A child likes to do everything practically. How about a child learning each and everything given in his/her books through playful activities and toys that he loves to work on and then work on the abstract part of knowledge through books that are synchronized with the activities. Doesn't this sound interesting? Yes, this is the exact thing we are doing. And it is done with the help of our preschool package including the proactivity box.

company_details:
Food Vybe was conceptualized to purposefully attend to a very specific need that was not being addressed by any existing known restaurant directory/review portal. There was the need to know the 'vibe' of a place at any given point in time. We understand how important and valuable it is to know how crowded a place is. Even more so, during the time of a pandemic and after it passes as well. Through our 'vybe-o-meter', our users can get an estimated percentage of occupancy in real-time for any restaurant that we have listed with us.

The customers who choose to come to the restaurant would be well aware of the 'vybe' and can prepare accordingly. For example, they won't be surprised to have to wait for a table, or maybe someone would rather be happy to visit a less crowded restaurant for a corporate dinner meeting.

Our vetting is done over our proprietary interview conduction platforms by an uberized pool of interviewers who are engineers at top tech companies and go through a strong calibration process, ensuring structured high-quality interviews. We are a technology company on a mission to equip students with relevant skills & practical exposure through internships and online training. Imagine a world full of freedom and possibilities. A world where you can discover your passion and turn it into your career. A world where your practical skills matter more than your university degree. about_the_internship:
We are in the process of improving the UX and functionality of our app and are looking for software development engineers (Android) to join our young team. If your calling is to solve complex challenges through elegant & modular code, this role is for you. As a software development intern, you will help us build the technology that powers our products and services. You will work with our web engineers as well as our design & product teams to deliver high-quality features on our app.

Key responsibilities:
1. Building and maintaining features for our Android app
2. Unit-testing code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability
3. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features

What will you get?
1. Great mentoring - A great beginning to your programming career
2. A shot at building something truly disruptive. There is no revolutionary product for recruitment, like there is Uber for transportation/Amazon for e-commerce
3. A chance to really make a difference by creating products that will impact millions of lives for a better
4. Awesome colleagues & a fun work environment
additional_information: Job offer: On successful conversion to a permanent employee, the candidate can expect a salary of Rs. 6 to 7 Lac/annum

1. Manage infrastructure monitoring
2. Manage services for Hadoop, AWS, Azure, Docker, and Kubernetes Clusters
3. Execute all the supporting tasks which are included but not limited to code deployment
4. Manage source control systems, virtual servers, scripting, etc.

8. Involve in writing and modifying scripts for application deployments as well as system monitoring
9. Involve in developing and overseeing the backup, replication, clustering and failover strategies
10. Upgrade the software installed including on to the server including upgrading virus software and code upgrades
11. Maintain the Hadoop Clusters, AWS, Azure, and Microservices

company_details:
Food Vybe was conceptualized to purposefully attend to a very specific need that was not being addressed by any existing known restaurant directory/review portal. There was the need to know the 'vibe' of a place at any given point in time. We understand how important and valuable it is to know how crowded a place is. Even more so, during the time of a pandemic and after it passes as well. Through our 'vybe-o-meter', our users can get an estimated percentage of occupancy in real-time for any restaurant that we have listed with us.

The customers who choose to come to the restaurant would be well aware of the 'vybe' and can prepare accordingly. For example, they won't be surprised to have to wait for a table, or maybe someone would rather be happy to visit a less crowded restaurant for a corporate dinner meeting.

company_details:
Listiee is a dynamic and agile startup of the 20th century that wants to solve the problem of the chaos of information on the internet. We are the first-ever generic listing platform on the internet that helps its users publish, ask, and discover a variety of lists. Our collaborative technology allows users on the platform with their friends and teams to build useful lists, list stacks, and boards. Realizing that the way to organize anything is to first build a list of it, what we have is the first step towards our big goal of solving the problem of the chaos of information.

Imagine a future where you are discovering data in the form of lists and each list item is linked with a variety of links related to it from the internet, contextually categorized, and suddenly you don't need to wander around to learn the jargon, know & play with the keywords on search engines, or visit other websites to get multiple sets of information. This is possible with us.

company_details: At Flahmingo, we believe that every Canadian should feel financially empowered. The current tools available to Canadians make finance complicated. Flahmingo is on a mission to help one million Canadians through saving, investing, and increasing financial literacy. Flahmingo is a digital investment firm. We have created an application where users can begin investing with as little as $1. Using a system called Pies and Slices, Flahmingo enables you to build a portfolio of your favorite companies and ETFs. These investments become 'slices' of your 'pie'. Using scheduled deposits and auto-magic round-ups (both investment automation strategies), users seamlessly grow their portfolios and maintain a diversified portfolio using the power of fractional shares. Using the power of fractional shares, Flahmingo allows you to own as little as $1 in companies like Tesla, Facebook, and Apple. But the fun doesn't stop there! With Flahmingo central, learn about the stock market in a fun and easy way.

company_details:
Food Vybe was conceptualized to purposefully attend to a very specific need that was not being addressed by any existing known restaurant directory/review portal. There was the need to know the 'vibe' of a place at any given point in time. We understand how important and valuable it is to know how crowded a place is. Even more so, during the time of a pandemic and after it passes as well. Through our 'vybe-o-meter', our users can get an estimated percentage of occupancy in real-time for any restaurant that we have listed with us.

The customers who choose to come to the restaurant would be well aware of the 'vybe' and can prepare accordingly. For example, they won't be surprised to have to wait for a table, or maybe someone would rather be happy to visit a less crowded restaurant for a corporate dinner meeting.

Through our 'vybe-o-meter', our users can get an estimated percentage of occupancy in real-time for any restaurant that we have listed with us.

The customers who choose to come to the restaurant would be well aware of the 'vybe' and can prepare accordingly. For example, they won't be surprised to have to wait for a table, or maybe someone would rather be happy to visit a less crowded restaurant for a corporate dinner meeting.

company_details: Himalaya Labs is a London-based blockchain venture founded to bring the vision of HCX (Himalaya Capital Exchange) into reality. HCX is a blockchain and smart-contract driven platform where issuers (public and private firms, governments, non-profit foundations) can access a broad class of primary market investors (both institutional and retail), complete a variety of automated transactions and processes (such as book building, auctions, syndications, dividend distributions) and can issue a broad array of digital assets to investors. Investors of every type, jurisdiction, and financial status can use the platform to learn about investment opportunities across the globe, their regulatory aspects, risks, and expected returns, to access due-diligence reports, and to invest directly without having to go through intermediaries. The system can first be envisaged as a single-country system and then extended to a multi-country global marketplace.

company_details:
Food Vybe was conceptualized to purposefully attend to a very specific need that was not being addressed by any existing known restaurant directory/review portal. There was the need to know the 'vibe' of a place at any given point in time. We understand how important and valuable it is to know how crowded a place is. Even more so, during the time of a pandemic and after it passes as well. Through our 'vybe-o-meter', our users can get an estimated percentage of occupancy in real-time for any restaurant that we have listed with us.

The customers who choose to come to the restaurant would be well aware of the 'vybe' and can prepare accordingly. For example, they won't be surprised to have to wait for a table, or maybe someone would rather be happy to visit a less crowded restaurant for a corporate dinner meeting.

Fin-tech is a combination of 'financial technology' and is used to describe new tech that seeks to improve & automate the delivery and use of financial services. Up until now, financial services institutions offered a variety of services under a single umbrella. In its most basic form, fin-tech unbundles these services into individual offerings. company_details: At Flahmingo, we believe that every Canadian should feel financially empowered. The current tools available to Canadians make finance complicated. Flahmingo is on a mission to help one million Canadians through saving, investing, and increasing financial literacy. Flahmingo is a digital investment firm. We have created an application where users can begin investing with as little as $1. Using a system called Pies and Slices, Flahmingo enables you to build a portfolio of your favorite companies and ETFs. These investments become 'slices' of your 'pie'. Using scheduled deposits and auto-magic round-ups (both investment automation strategies), users seamlessly grow their portfolios and maintain a diversified portfolio using the power of fractional shares. Using the power of fractional shares, Flahmingo allows you to own as little as $1 in companies like Tesla, Facebook, and Apple. But the fun doesn't stop there! With Flahmingo central, learn about the stock market in a fun and easy way.

iTalent India offers simple and measurable business performance solutions, BizGrow, to small and medium-sized businesses that help it define, track, and measure the most relevant business metrics resulting in business growth. BizGrow is an amalgamated solution that combines the benefits of both business consulting and software, ensuring defining metrics along with its implementation. 

BizGrow helps the business grow faster by visualizing its everyday business growth score and highlighting areas that need immediate attention. Rich insights from everyday metrics tracking give the leader the firepower to act with data, removing guesswork and enhancing accuracy in decision making. Significant growth in employee engagement is seen as employees know what is expected out of them & the number of efforts required to succeed. This empowers employees at all levels to drive the company towards the leap forward to success.

Kasper Consulting (www.kasperconsulting.com) is a small boutique consulting company. We are a group of professionals who offer our expertise in information technology (IT) and business process consulting to our clients from our real-life experiences of working as CIOs, ops heads, etc. in multinational companies. From our experience in working in the corporate world, we have seen that there is usually an understanding gap between business end-users and IT. They never understand each other's domain. The business end-users are expected to perform tasks they have little experience on, such as preparing the business requirements document, evaluating IT applications, preparing user acceptance test plans, or doing the user acceptance test. IT, in turn, usually does not understand the business. We, at Kasper Consulting, bridge this gap with the help of our techno-functional consultants who are more functional than techno.

company_details: At Flahmingo, we believe that every Canadian should feel financially empowered. The current tools available to Canadians make finance complicated. Flahmingo is on a mission to help one million Canadians through saving, investing, and increasing financial literacy. Flahmingo is a digital investment firm. We have created an application where users can begin investing with as little as $1. Using a system called Pies and Slices, Flahmingo enables you to build a portfolio of your favorite companies and ETFs. These investments become 'slices' of your 'pie'. Using scheduled deposits and auto-magic round-ups (both investment automation strategies), users seamlessly grow their portfolios and maintain a diversified portfolio using the power of fractional shares. Using the power of fractional shares, Flahmingo allows you to own as little as $1 in companies like Tesla, Facebook, and Apple. But the fun doesn't stop there! With Flahmingo central, learn about the stock market in a fun and easy way.

company_details:
Website
Glossaread is working towards making higher education more convenient and accessible. College students go overlooking to amass their study material content through rudimentary ways, seniors' notes, cheap guide books, photocopying chapters of books, professors' notes, looking up on YouTube or anything else online, etc. They spend a reasonable amount of time, effort, and money to get this going. Glossaread solves the problem by bringing all the study material online in line with the university syllabus structure, published in a single place. Professors across universities build course-wise content in line with the prescribed university syllabus.

The material is curated and published online. It's the latest and the best in class. Glossaread has tied up with publishing houses to make the best-in-class books available for students by splitting the books into chapters so that they can pick the latest books and just the chapters they need.

company_details: The name of the Foundation has been derived from Ubuntu, a traditional African philosophy meaning humanity. It is often translated as 'I am because we are', or 'humanity towards others', but is often used in a more philosophical sense to mean -the belief in a universal bond of sharing that connects all humanity.-  Ubantu Foundation as a social organization in its current form has evolved in last five years out of the extensive community organization and research work undertaken by Sumit Singh, Director of Ubantu Foundation in Jodhpur and Goa. The two successful initiatives namely smart colony - smart wad initiative and social intervention for establishing biodegradable sanitary pad making as a business model for women self-help groups in Jodhpur and Goa have provided a solid background to the foundation for future interventions.

company_details:
Website
SimplePlan Media is all about doing great things in the simplest way possible. When we say simple, we don't mean easy - anyone who has ever tried running a marathon knows what we mean. That's not it though! What drives us every day is striving towards providing our clients with simple solutions to support their grand endeavors. At SimplePlan Media, silly ideas are not laughed at or looked down upon. Instead, they are played with and shaped into amazing creations. And this is what separates us from several other digital agencies. We are not about traversing a known path ahead of all others, we are about carving a new path where others only see a roadblock. 

This also means that we don't limit ourselves to only what we excel in. Instead, we take up challenges in every niche ranging from web design to mobile app development as well as brand identity creation.

company_details:
Website
Internshala is a dot com business with the heart of dot org. We are a technology company on a mission to equip students with relevant skills & practical exposure through internships and online training. Imagine a world full of freedom and possibilities. A world where you can discover your passion and turn it into your career. A world where your practical skills matter more than your university degree. A world where you do not have to wait till you're 21 to taste your first work experience (and get a rude shock that it is nothing like you had imagined it to be). A world where you graduate fully assured, fully confident, and fully prepared to stake a claim on your place in the world. At Internshala, we are making this dream a reality, join us!
about_the_internship:
This role is for those who love solving meaningful problems through modular and functional code. Our software development engineers (web) work with our product team to deliver high quality, high impact products.

The learning curve for SDEs at Internshala is huge. Our team works on several products (we have 2 main websites and an app, along with several minor websites) in parallel. We work on some of the most advanced technologies using languages including HTML, CSS, JS, PHP, Angular, React, Python, Android, and more. Adding to this is a ton of analytics, servers maintenance, and security-related tasks resulting in a journey full of learning and fun. This role would be an ideal career start for a developer.

What will you get?
1. Great mentoring - A great beginning to your programming career
2. A shot at building something truly disruptive, there is no revolutionary product for the recruitment like there is Uber for transportation/Amazon for e-commerce
3. A chance to really make a difference by creating products that will impact millions of lives for better
4. Awesome colleagues & a fun work environment
additional_information:
Job offer: On successful conversion to a permanent employee, the candidate can expect a salary of Rs. 6 to 7 Lac/annum
For outstation candidates, we provide PG accommodation for the first 7 days and also reimbursement of AC-3 tier train fare for relocation.

company_details:
Website
Fin-tech is a combination of 'financial technology' and is used to describe new tech that seeks to improve & automate the delivery and use of financial services. At its core, fin-tech is utilized to help companies, business owners and consumers better manage their financial operations, processes, and lives by utilizing specialized software & algorithms that are used on computers and, increasingly, smartphones. Up until now, financial services institutions offered a variety of services under a single umbrella. In its most basic form, fin-tech unbundles these services into individual offerings. The combination of streamlined offerings with technology enables fin-tech companies to be more efficient and cut down on costs associated with each transaction. We make the complete loan disbursement process quick & easy. We are not only an enabler but also the driving engine for instant personal loans. We blend finance and technology, paving the way for the future of the finance sector in India.

At its core, fin-tech is utilized to help companies, business owners and consumers better manage their financial operations, processes, and lives by utilizing specialized software & algorithms that are used on computers and, increasingly, smartphones. Up until now, financial services institutions offered a variety of services under a single umbrella. In its most basic form, fin-tech unbundles these services into individual offerings. The combination of streamlined offerings with technology enables fin-tech companies to be more efficient and cut down on costs associated with each transaction. We make the complete loan disbursement process quick & easy. We are not only an enabler but also the driving engine for instant personal loans. We blend finance and technology, paving the way for the future of the finance sector in India.

company_details:
Food Vybe was conceptualized to purposefully attend to a very specific need that was not being addressed by any existing known restaurant directory/review portal. There was the need to know the 'vibe' of a place at any given point in time. We understand how important and valuable it is to know how crowded a place is. Even more so, during the time of a pandemic and after it passes as well. Through our 'vybe-o-meter', our users can get an estimated percentage of occupancy in real-time for any restaurant that we have listed with us.

The customers who choose to come to the restaurant would be well aware of the 'vybe' and can prepare accordingly. For example, they won't be surprised to have to wait for a table, or maybe someone would rather be happy to visit a less crowded restaurant for a corporate dinner meeting.
